channel.title: How do i compile with 64 bit computer?
channel.description:
Idk how to compile with my new 64 bit computer...
here is what my code looks like.. [code] @echo off title Compiler "C:/Program Files /Java\jdk1.6.0_24/bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java pause [/code] I have tried this also... [code] @echo off title Compiler "C:/Program Files (x86) /Java\jdk1.6.0_24/bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java pause [/code]

item.title: How do i compile with 64 bit computer?
item.dc:creator: @Pluvia Pluvia
item.description:
@Pluvia wrote:

Idk how to compile with my new 64 bit computer…

here is what my code looks like…

@echo off
title Compiler
"C:/Program Files /Java\jdk1.6.0_24/bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java
pause

I have tried this also…

@echo off
title Compiler
"C:/Program Files (x86) /Java\jdk1.6.0_24/bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java
pause

Read full topic
item.source: How do i compile with 64 bit computer?
